unnormalised: League transfers are crucial. East Bengal's potential signing of a new centre-back could bolster their I-League chances. Remember the "Chak De! India" spirit? A strong team with great coordination is key. Mohun Bagan also needs to strategize wisely with their R. list. Good transfers can cover many km on the pitch. The auction on 20-08-2024 will be decisive. Rs. 50 Lakh should be a suitable amount. Let's see how the teams use their quota.
